beers.description: Satanic Cuckoo Clock double dry hopped with Idaho7 and conditioned on copious amounts of  mango, guava and peach puree.
beers.summary: Satanic Cuckoo Clock double dry hopped with Idaho7 and conditioned on copious amounts of  mango, guava and peach puree.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #21. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #21. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of ripe kiwi, honeydew melon, star fruit, and dried blueberries
beers.description: Wheat Pale Ale. 5.0% Brewed with an enormous amount of German malted wheat. Aggressively hopped in the kettle and dry-hopped with German Cascade and German Saaz, then double dry hopped with Mosaic Lupulin pellets.
beers.summary:
Wheat Pale Ale. 5.0% Brewed with an enormous amount of German malted wheat. Aggressively hopped in the kettle and dry-hopped with German Cascade and German Saaz, then double dry hopped with Mosaic Lupulin pellets.
Notes of ripe kiwi, honeydew melon, star fruit, and dried blueberries

beers.notes: Notes of  guava, mango candies, pineapple weed, ocean air, and dank funnie green stuff.
beers.description: Cool Dude Double IPA. 8.0% Brewed with raw wheat and fluffy oats. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Simcoe and Zythos and then hyper aggressively dry hopped with a trio of super pungent cool dude hops: Nelson Sauvin, Mosaic, and Citra. Cool. Very cool.
beers.summary:
Cool Dude Double IPA. 8.0% Brewed with raw wheat and fluffy oats. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Simcoe and Zythos and then hyper aggressively dry hopped with a trio of super pungent cool dude hops: Nelson Sauvin, Mosaic, and Citra. Cool. Very cool.
Notes of  guava, mango candies, pineapple weed, ocean air, and dank funnie green stuff.

beers.notes: Notes of ripe melon, underripe mango, orange pith, and grapefruit rind.
beers.description: Crushable IPA. 5.9% Brewed with heaps of pillowy oats. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Zythos then dry hopped with a massive amount of hand selected Nelson Sauvin and Amarillo.
beers.summary:
Crushable IPA. 5.9% Brewed with heaps of pillowy oats. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Zythos then dry hopped with a massive amount of hand selected Nelson Sauvin and Amarillo.
Notes of ripe melon, underripe mango, orange pith, and grapefruit rind.

beers.notes: Notes of watermelon rind, blueberry, invigorating minerality, and sunny garden strolls.
beers.description: Rhubarb Dandelion Saison. 4.8% Brewed with spelt. Gently hopped with Melba, hibiscus and locally foraged Dandelion greens and flowers. Fermented for many moons with our magickal saison yeast atop house processed rhubarb puree. 10% of the proceeds of this beer will benefit Be the Match: The National Marrow Donor Program.
beers.summary:
Rhubarb Dandelion Saison. 4.8% Brewed with spelt. Gently hopped with Melba, hibiscus and locally foraged Dandelion greens and flowers. Fermented for many moons with our magickal saison yeast atop house processed rhubarb puree. 10% of the proceeds of this beer will benefit Be the Match: The National Marrow Donor Program.
Notes of watermelon rind, blueberry, invigorating minerality, and sunny garden strolls.

beers.notes: Notes of ripe feijoa, fresh baked sugar cookies, star fruit, kiwi, and fresh guava juice.
beers.description: Pineapple & Guava Lactose Saison. 5.7% Brewed with our sweet pals Tim & Connor from Cellarmaker. Inspired by our boundless travels in New Zealand. Brewed with Pilsner malt, red wheat, and lactose sugar. Gently hopped with Hallertau Blanc and debittered Cascade and conditioned atop pineapple and guava puree.
beers.summary:
Pineapple & Guava Lactose Saison. 5.7% Brewed with our sweet pals Tim & Connor from Cellarmaker. Inspired by our boundless travels in New Zealand. Brewed with Pilsner malt, red wheat, and lactose sugar. Gently hopped with Hallertau Blanc and debittered Cascade and conditioned atop pineapple and guava puree.
Notes of ripe feijoa, fresh baked sugar cookies, star fruit, kiwi, and fresh guava juice.

beers.notes: Notes of celery soda, lemon peel, barnyard, lime juice, and a summer garden.
beers.description: Spiced Saison. 4.5% Brewed with wheat and spiced with pink peppercorn, curry powder, and lovage. Fermented with our Magickal Saison yeast.
beers.summary:
Spiced Saison. 4.5% Brewed with wheat and spiced with pink peppercorn, curry powder, and lovage. Fermented with our Magickal Saison yeast.
Notes of celery soda, lemon peel, barnyard, lime juice, and a summer garden.
